title: Home | next-i18next
posProvider-description: We offer the best point-of-sale systems from a range of choices to handle customer payments for your business. The right system can improve daily business operations by helping you smoothly manage sales, track inventory and boost revenue with customer loyalty programs.
webDesign-description: Choose from an unrivalled set of best-in-class website templates and deploy them using the best technology. Describe your business to us and we will customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs.
brandDesign-description: Haven't decided on what your business will look like? We offer our own Brand design service. Brand design is all about creating a brand identity that perfectly reflects your brand and we can help you. Tell us more about you and we can make it happen.
marketingSupport-description: Top Payment can help increase real user traffic and potential customers to your website with an SEO campaign that is specifically designed for your business. Start getting more qualified search traffic to your website today with our search engine optimization services.
247hotline-description: Have a question or questions? Our hotline call centre has both digital and live operators on standby 24/7. With the capacity, flexibility and drive to answer all of your customers' questions and needs. Contact us and we can set up a hotline that meets the needs of your organization.
shopDesign-description: Need help realizing your own vision when it comes to business space? Our interior designers here at Top Payment can help consult and bring your vision to life. We guarantee the price and quality design per your needs. Contact our interior design pro services via Top Payment.
providers_description_1:
Our work with the world’s
leading brands
providers_description_2: We here at Top Payment strive to offer our service and expertise to as many customers as possible. Contact us and we can help jump start your business
promotions_description_1: Sign up now to get a good deal.
promotions_description_2: Not only do we offer the best services, there are plenty of good deals to go around. For a limited time only, sign up now and get a $450 coupon for your next purchase.
contact_description_2: We know the best solution for all of your business ideas and we can help you solve all business problems
cloverSum: We know the best solution for all of your business ideas and we can help you solve all business problems
cloverDesc: A full point-of-sale system in one sleek little package. Mini can fit into any space but packs plenty of POS power to run your business, end to end. Use it just for payments or to run your whole business from inventory to payroll.
paxA920Sum: We know the best solution for all of your business ideas and we can help you solve all business problems
paxA920Desc: The revolutionary terminal that started it all. The A920 combines the full features of an Android tablet with a powerful POS payment terminal, all in a sleek and compact design.
cloverProSum: We know the best solution for all of your business ideas and we can help you solve all business problems
cloverProDesc: One central hub for power and processing. One screen for you, one for your customers. And just one rate for all your credit, debit, and gift card payments.
cloverFlexSum: We know the best solution for all of your business ideas and we can help you solve all business problems
cloverFlexDesc: Serve customers better – at the counter, in line, at the table, or in the field – with the Clover Flex handheld POS system. This all-in-one device offers built-in capabilities to accept payments, conduct business, and track sales all from the palm of your hand.
paxE800Sum: We know the best solution for all of your business ideas and we can help you solve all business problems
paxE800Desc: PAX’s E800 is a visually striking game-changer. Elegance is everything in-store, yet cash registers have never made for a stylish checkout experience until today. Sporting a gorgeous 15-inch IPS touchscreen display, the E800 delivers lightning fast performance when it matters the most. The E-series runs on PAXBiz® powered by Android™, giving you access to a whole world of third-party business apps and solutions.
